description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs

NETWORKNET-33906 Long Message ID truncated to 63 characters while extracting message from PST (.NET)
NETWORKNET-33907 Sender format changed while PST to EML conversion
NETWORKNET-34042 Colored text in MSG converted to Black in TIFF using MailPrinter
NETWORKNET-34051 Linked Resource identifying as Regular attachment
NETWORKNET-34054 MSG to EML: Encoding issue in the output files
NETWORKNET-34066 Name attribute is added to EML content while EML->EML conversion
NETWORKNET-34069 EML to MSG raises System.FormatException
NETWORKNET-34071 Erroneous body after EML to MSG conversion
NETWORKNET-34073 Adding RecurrencePattern to MapiCalendar hides it in Outlook calendar
NETWORKNET-34076 MSG to EML: "From" field information is lost
NETWORKNET-34077 EWS: Backup other user's Mailbox not working
NETWORKNET-34083 EML to MSG: From column information missing in Outlook
NETWORKNET-34084 System.ArgumentException while converting VCard with photo to MapiContact.
NETWORKNET-34088 Adding MapiContact to PST losses Contact Photo
NETWORKNET-34089 Loading MSG file raises System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException
NETWORKNET-34090 Attachments lost when SkipValidityChecking used to load MSG file
NETWORKNET-34091 Attachment lost when adding MapiContact to PST
NETWORKNET-34093 EML to MHTML: Characters in message turned garbage
NETWORKNET-34096 Error when converting msg file
NETWORKNET-34097 KeyNotFoundException in RequestApointment when StartTimeZone is Europe/Moscow
NETWORKNET-34105 Loading MSG file gives System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException
NETWORKNET-34060 PST created using Aspose.Email is larger than those created with Outlook

Enhancements

NETWORKNET-33952 POP Authentication using DefaultCredentials
NETWORKNET-34078 Provide facility to add Photo data to MapiContact
NETWORKNET-34102 Add new method with MesageLoadOptions as parameter to load MailMessage.
NETWORKNET-34057 Adding MSGs to PST: Possible slow performance

New Feature
NETWORKNET-33393 Implement ability to save MapiContact, MapiNote, MapiTask in the MSG file
NETWORKNET-33411 Implement S/MIME E-Mail Object Algorithm
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
